    • Field Detail

      • number

        protected java.lang.String number
        A quote/invoice number de devis/facture is represented by pattern yymmn. yy : first 2 digits of current year
        mm : month digits
        n : an incremental number

      • description

        protected java.lang.String description
        Invoice/quote label.

      • estab

        Establishment id.

        Invoice member id.

      • payer

        protected int payer
        Client id. Payer must exists in Algem contacts.

        Creation date.

      • getTotalVAT

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getTotalVAT()
        Calculates the total VAT amount for each invoice item. Totals are saved in a map with percents of VAT for keys.
        Returns:
        a map[VAT rate -> total]

      • hasDownPayment

        public boolean hasDownPayment()
        Checks if quote/invoice includes a down payment.
        Returns:
        true if downPayment > 0
